code: import{OPENCHAT}from"../constants/action-types";var initialState={openChat:false};var openChatReducer=function openChatReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case OPENCHAT:return Object.assign({},state,{openChat:action.payload});default:return state;}};export default openChatReducer;
